column4: way OT: for a us citizen to travel abroad, what documentation do i need? (or rather where can i look this up; google searches returns result of ppl leaving the us permenantely; i just want to travel)
what should i be googling for? i feel this has to be well documented somewhere on the internet
wait; if i'm going to HK, i don't need this?
travel.state.gov and please stop the off-topic
